text: Ra jaba unīsita bhanincha ki, ‘‘juna jīvikā timīlā'ī allāhalē di'ēkōcha, tyasamadhyēbāṭa kēhī (dāna) kharca gara.’’ Ta yī kāphiraharū mōminaharūsita bhandachanḥ ki ‘‘hāmīlē tī mānisaharūlā'ī kina khuvā'unē, jasalā'ī yadi allāhalē cāhēkō bha'ē svayam khuvā'idinthyō? Timī ta spaṣṭa bhūlamā chau.’’
